item.title: MLAâ€™s Aide Accused of Encroaching Panchayat Land in Gattu Mandal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A major land encroachment controversy has surfaced in Gattu Mandal, with serious allegations being made against Ramakrishna Reddy (RK Reddy), a close aide of the local MLA. According to Balram Naidu, President of the Nadigadda Human Rights Protection Committee (NHPS), Gattu Mandal, the encroachment involves valuable village panchayat land that has allegedly been taken over with the backing of the MLA.
The encroached land, reportedly meant for public or panchayat use, is now being used f...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Kalahandi to Gadwal: Lesser-known saree weaving hidden gems in India
item.description:
<![CDATA[Paithan, Maharashtra
We all know the regal grandeur of Paithani sarees, but have you ever wondered where they come from? Paithan is renowned for its Paithani silk sarees and has a rich heritage, where these sarees are crafted using interlocking weave techniques.(Image Credits: Pinterest)...]]>
item.author: Piyali Bhadra
